p: Main fraction XIV (1077 mg) was applied to repeated silica gel column under the same condition. Sub-fraction SA-XIV-2 (694.4 mg) was injected to the HPLC under the same condition, which showed two prominent peaks, that afforded a single spot each and were labeled as 3 (R t 19.65 min, 7.1 mg, 0.023%) and 5 (R t 27.41 min, 7.2 mg, 0.0084%).
